# Plan 

## Set-up
1. Clean whiteboard and projector screen
2. Get to know the other group members
3. One person log in to PC or use own laptop - 
4. Go to the Module page (via Bb or directly) <https://www.math.ntnu.no/emner/TMA4268/2018v/2StatLearn/2StatLearn.html#PartB>
5. Panel on table: choose HDMI or PC to take over projector

## First hour

6. 10.20ish: Mette gives a short introduction to the first hour
7. Group work - TA and Mette available for advice
8. 10.55: Mette sums up (or Kahoot!?)

9. Break

## Second hour

10. 11.15: Mette gives a short introduction to the second hour
11. Group work
12. 11.55: Mette sums up  (or Kahoot!?)

# Why (random) groups?

* Discuss, ask, explain.
* Take different roles.
* Practice on working _as_ a group (not _in_ a group)
* Get to know fellow students
* When you start working (finished being a student) being able to work as a group is an important skill.
